attributes.action: Stop big buisness taking over the world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Big government and big buisness is not whats needed.The global businesses are destroying our world and are whats making people poorer and poorer and dragging us deeper into corruption.
We need a real change.Not fake change to benefit the elite globalists gorden.
Help support small buisnesses like you have supported the global ones all theses years downing street.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence: 
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/SME-funding-SOS/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
